item.title: LunaVPN Cancellation Policy
item.description: Last Updated: 2023-12-30 This document outlines the cancellation policy of LunaVPN, a division of RePass Cloud Pty Ltd (‘we’, ‘us’, or ‘our’), and provides guidance on the process for cancelling a subscription to our services (‘Services’).

item.title: 32 Worldwide Locations
item.description: Explore LunaVPN’s extensive network of 32 worldwide locations. Test the speed of our VPN servers hosted on Vultr and experience lightning-fast connections.

item.title: Acceptable Use Policy
item.description: Last updated December 13, 2023 This Acceptable Use Policy (’Policy’) is part of our __________ (’Legal Terms’) and should therefore be read alongside our main Legal Terms: __________.

item.title: Automatic Updates - Android
item.description: You can update your Android apps and the Play Store app one at a time, all together, or automatically.

item.title: Automatic Updates - iOS
item.description: If you’d prefer to manually update all of your apps, turn off automatic updates.

item.title: How to setup WireGuard connection on iOS
item.description: Here are the steps you will go through: Install WireGuard on iOS Install WireGuard on iOS Open the App Store, type in WireGuard and download the WireGuard application

item.title: No Logs Policy
item.description: LunaVPN No-Logs Policy At LunaVPN, our primary mission is to ensure your online privacy and security through a VPN service.

item.description: A Warm Welcome from LunaVPN! Dear Valued Customer, I’m thrilled to welcome you to the LunaVPN family!

item.title: What Is A VPN?
item.description: A VPN or virutal private network, is a secure tunnel between your device and the internet, designed to shield you from prying eyes, interference, and censorship.
